pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw:
It's not very clear to me why we would have two modes instead of one. As I understand it, the only difference between the right-click-follow and the startup-track-visual is that one is set the moment the world is loaded. But I would expect both to have the same parameters to be configured and it should be possible to escape either of them by pressing Esc. Is there a reason to have 2 different behaviours?

Also, I don't understand how you would follow something without specifying a name. 

I think there might be some sort of misunderstanding about the words "visual" and "model". The current follow mode which can be triggered by right-clicking something is essentially tracking a `rendering::Visual`. The GUI allows you to either track a "model visual" or a "link visual", by right-clicking it on the left panel and choosing Follow.
